definition: to cause to take on a definite and clear shape
details:
verb
- to cause to take on a definite and clear shape
= example: to cause to take on a definite and clear shape
= synonyms: crystalise, crystalize
- to assume crystalline form
= example: to assume crystalline form
= synonyms: crystalise, crystalize, effloresce
- to cause to form crystals or assume crystalline form
= example: to cause to form crystals or assume crystalline form
= synonyms: crystalise, crystalize
- to make free from confusion or ambiguity
= synonyms: clear
